item.description:
Hi Incubators!

Come one and come all to the street where it all goes down. And bring your jackets too. It will be brisk but beautiful time for improv in the famed Cherry Street back yard.

For those who have never been, come out to the backyard before we head inside for winter.

For all you regulars, let's make fall the rise of improv!

Bring friends, smiles, and check the rest of the day at the curb.

Remember no experience required.

Any questions and concerns let me know.

Cheers

Jason J.

p.s. if you are interested in being part of an improv troupe that performs at rehab centers, shelters, retirement homes and the like, drop me an email.
item.name: Opening Soon: Cherry Street: Improv Never Sleeps!!!
